price: Nibateshwe bate, barahumba! Ahubwo mu vy’ukuri, abahakanyi kuri uwo musi w’izuka, bazobuzwa kubona Imana yabo Rurema Allah[1];
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
footnotes: [1] Iyi Aayah, irerekana ko abemeramana ari bo bazobona Imana yabo Rurema Allah mu Bwami bw’ijuru.

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
